sourcesContent:
import { Box, Flex, Heading, HStack, Link, Icon, useBreakpointValue, useColorMode, Button } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { FaHome, FaUser, FaCode, FaProjectDiagram, FaEnvelope, FaSun, FaMoon } from 'react-icons/fa';

const Header = () => {
  const { colorMode, toggleColorMode } = useColorMode();
  const fontSize = useBreakpointValue({ base: 'md', md: 'lg' });

  return (
    <Box
      bg={colorMode === 'light' ? 'gray.900' : 'gray.800'}
      color={colorMode === 'light' ? 'white' : 'gray.200'}
      py="4"
      px="5"
      borderBottom="2px solid"
      borderColor="orange.500"
    >
      <Flex
        direction="row"
        align="center"
        justify="space-between"
        maxW="1200px"
        mx="auto"
        wrap="wrap"
      >
        <Heading
          size="lg"
          fontFamily="'Roboto', sans-serif"
          color={colorMode === 'light' ? 'orange.400' : 'orange.300'}
        >
          Kenneth's Portfolio
        </Heading>

        <HStack spacing="8" fontSize={fontSize} wrap="wrap" mt={{ base: '4', md: '0' }}>
          <Link href="#home" _hover={{ color: 'orange.300' }} display="flex" alignItems="center">
            <Icon as={FaHome} mr="2" /> Home
          </Link>
          <Link href="#about" _hover={{ color: 'orange.300' }} display="flex" alignItems="center">
            <Icon as={FaUser} mr="2" /> About
          </Link>
          <Link href="#skills" _hover={{ color: 'orange.300' }} display="flex" alignItems="center">
            <Icon as={FaCode} mr="2" /> Skills
          </Link>
          <Link href="#projects" _hover={{ color: 'orange.300' }} display="flex" alignItems="center">
            <Icon as={FaProjectDiagram} mr="2" /> Projects
          </Link>
          <Link href="#contact" _hover={{ color: 'orange.300' }} display="flex" alignItems="center">
            <Icon as={FaEnvelope} mr="2" /> Contact
          </Link>
        </HStack>

        <Button 
          onClick={toggleColorMode} 
          variant="outline"
          colorScheme="orange"
          size="md"
          aria-label={colorMode === 'light' ? 'Switch to dark mode' : 'Switch to light mode'}
        >
          <Icon as={colorMode === 'light' ? FaMoon : FaSun} />
        </Button>
      </Flex>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Header;
